meta.name: Description
meta.content: Get the latest news and features at The Sun - Showbiz, babes, celebrities, sport and racing, national and international news. Check out the best pictures, videos, virals and podcasts.

img.alt: FOOTBALL: Mancini's Italian job - Azzurri want Rob if they fail at Euros
img.title: FOOTBALL: Mancini's Italian job - Azzurri want Rob if they fail at Euros

div.p: FANS who followed England’s Euro 2012 team to Krakow yesterday were warned they face a terrifying police crackdown if they cause trouble. Cops in the Polish city are armed with an array of weapons including shotguns — and a hi-tech sonic cannon that makes victims wet themselves.

div.h2: ‘Cannibal’ Luka Magnotta’s possible link to LA murder investigated
div.p: CANNIBAL killer suspect Luka Magnotta has been linked to a severed head, hands and feet found under the Hollywood sign. The body parts of gay retired airline worker Hervey Medellin, 66, were found at the Los Angeles landmark in January.

div.h2: Fears as Rihanna cancels UK stay
div.p: RIHANNA sparked new health fears last night after she scrapped plans to come to Britain. The 24-year-old singer was due to jet into London yesterday and film a show for Sky Living today at the start of a ten-week stay.
